code: import{RESET_ALERT,SET_ALERT}from"../types";var alertReducer=function alertReducer(state,action){var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;switch(type){case SET_ALERT:return{type:payload.type,msg:payload.msg};case RESET_ALERT:return null;default:throw Error("Alert State Logic Error");}};export default alertReducer;
